title: Music Box
lyrics:
Here's a little gift
From me to you
A place to store you dreams
And your secrets too
When the world goes dark

I'll always be close by

To hear your dreams unfold

Hold you when you cry

And as you walk away

Let go of my hand

Smile as you turn for one last look

And know you understand



Listen to the song

And where it takes your soul

Watch the dancers spin around

A thousand times more

I've traveled across the sea

Just to bring you this

An unconditional waltz

And a loving kiss

I know I've been away

And for way too long

I need you now more than ever

Before the music is over



I want you to know

This song's for you

I want you to know

That I love you

I want you to know

This song's for you

I need you to know

That I love you
